snippet.title: Lareissa Everbright Announcement Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
Bursting with equipment, Gwenaelle is set to deliver a holy relic to Fort Trista. With each swing of her blade and snap of her bow, they dull and break. Mind each item well to survive this turn-based combat game with a tactical inventory management twist!

Join the Discord server for opportunities to win a free copy of the game before launch!
https://discord.gg/ZARpDT

Follow development on Twitter
https://twitter.com/lusternite
